summary: This document is an email chain from June 21, 2019, discussing the scheduling of a conference call to plan victim interviews in the Epstein case. Participants include FBI Victim Services personnel and a Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer.

persons.name: Finnegan
persons.context: Copied on an email about scheduling a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case; identified as someone who supervises CAFIs.

connections.description: Both are involved in planning a conference call regarding Epstein victim interviews, indicating a professional collaboration within the FBI's victim services framework.

events.title: Email chain scheduling Epstein victim interview planning call
events.description: An email chain among FBI Victim Services personnel discussing the scheduling of a conference call to plan victim interviews in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Victim Services Division was actively planning victim interviews for the Epstein case in June 2019.
The planning involved a Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer and supervisors of CAFIs, indicating specialized handling of potential minor victims.
The correspondence shows internal coordination within the FBI to schedule a conference call on this investigative matter.
